item.title: Ambari 离线安装(centos7.3)
item.description: Ambari 离线安装(centos7.3) 前期准备 配置主机hosts(每台机器都要配置/etc/hosts) 192.168.111.65 ambari-65 192.168.111.66 ambari-66 192.168.111.67 ambari-67 SSH免密登录配置 ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub root@bd02 ssh-copy-id -i ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub root@bd03 关闭及禁止防火墙 systemctl stop firewalld.service systemctl disable firewalld.service 关闭SELinux # /etc/sysconfig/selinux #修改
